events.title: Business Networking Mixer
events.description: Join local business owners for an evening of networking and collaboration. Great opportunity to make new connections and discuss potential partnerships.

events.title: Economic Development Forum
events.description: Discuss the future of economic growth in our community with industry leaders. Learn about upcoming development projects and investment opportunities.

events.title: Small Business Workshop
events.description: Learn essential skills for growing your small business in today's market. Topics include digital marketing, financial planning, and customer acquisition.

events.title: Annual Chamber Gala
events.description: Celebrate another successful year with the Chamber community. Black tie optional event with dinner, awards ceremony, and live entertainment.

events.title: Export & Trade Seminar
events.description: Expert guidance on expanding your business internationally. Learn about export regulations, market entry strategies, and trade financing.
